Question: kwnyy kya hay aur is ki klydy khsawsayat kya hayn؟

wazuha tawr par byan nahin kya gaya hay tou yeh pehlay sy taay shuda kymt haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh agar yeh yw aar ayl ka sabkha hay tou rwtr tshkyl shuda rastay sy mmasal hawgha۔dwsray lfzawn main ، agar yw aar ayl tshkyl shuda rastay sy shrwa hawta hay tou yeh mmasal hawgha۔yha sab sy aam tawr par astamal hony wali kdr haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، agar rastha {rastay kay sath tshkyl diya gaya haay: 'msaal' ، jzaw: msaal kay ajzaaa} ، yeh URL '/msaal' kay sath sath kesi bhi URL sy bhi mmasal hoga jo '/msaal/say shrwa hawta haay۔'/msaal/bchha' ، '/msaal/tfsaylat' ، wghyrha۔yha sirf is sawrt main mmasal hoga jab yw aar ayl tshkyl shuda rastay ka ayn mtaabk mych haw۔msaal kay tawr par 'balkl ، lekin yha'/msaal/bchay '،'/msaal/tfsaylat 'jysay yw aar ayl sy mmasal nahin hawgha۔ path mych praprty ka mksad rwt kay rastwn ki wzuahat aur un sy kis tarah yw aar ayl sy mmasal hay is par kabw panay main lchk fraham karna haay۔rastay.yha aap ko yeh btanay ki ajazat dyta hay keh aya aap kay mkhsawsa rwtngh ki zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، is rastay ko kesi sabkha kay tawr par ya ayn mtaabk mych kay tawr par mmasal hona chahaiay۔ dayfalt kay zaryaha ، 'sabkha' hakmt amly astamal ki jati hay ، jo zayada tr maamlat kay liye mwzawn hay jahan aap rastwn sy mlna chahti hayn۔jw yw aar ayl kay sabkha hayn۔taham ، kuch mnzarnamwn main ، jesay keh jab aap kesi ayn mtaabk mych ko nafza karna chahti hain tou ، aap rastay ki tshkyl main path mych ki praprty ko 'mkml' par trtyb dy kar 'mkml' hakmt amly ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ is bat ko zahan main rakhien keh path mych ki praprty sirf is bat par asar andaza hawty hay keh kis tarah is par asar prata haay۔rwtr yw aar ayl ko rastay kay rastay sy mlta haay۔as sy jzaw ki pysh ksh ya rwtngh slwk kay kesi dusray phalw ko mtasar nahin hawta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywytyda raؤt۔ kwiyrprmp praprty ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، ayktywyt rwt kwiry pyra aym aay py praprty kay zaryaay fy alhaal chalw rastay kay astfsar pyramytrza tak rsaiy fraham krta haay۔yha praprty aap ko nkshha ki tarah aabjykt fraham krty hay js main URL sy nkalay gaye astfsar kay pyramytrza hawtay hayn۔ yahan aap ayktywytyda raؤt ko astamal krsktay hayn۔ kwiyrprmp praprty: mtalwbha anhasaar draamd kryn: pehlay ، @kwnyy/rwtr sy ayktywytyda rwt klas draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn۔wha jzaw jahan aap astfsar pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal karna chahti hayn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {ayktywyt raؤt} sy '@kwnyy/raؤtr' ؛ ayktywytyda rwt msaal kay tawr par anjykshn kryn: aghla ، ajzaaa kay knstrktr main ayktywyt rwt ankyt ko anjykshn kryn۔questive questive paramamap praprty tak rsaiy haasal kryn: ab ، aap mwjwdha rwt sy wabstha astfsar pyramytrza ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ayktywytda raؤt ki astfsar praprt praprty tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔{// astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal kryn۔astfsar prymp praprty ayk mshahadha karnay wala hay ، lhazaa aap ko asal astfsar pyramytrza haasal karnay kay l it is ko sbskraib karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ sbskrpshn kay andr ، aap pyram aabjykt par dstyab mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey astfsar pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pyrams daat ghyt ('pyram nam') 'pyram nam' namy ayk mkhsawsa astfsar pyramytr ki kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aap 'pyram nam' ko astfsar pyramytr kay asal nam kay sath tbdyl krsktay hain js tak aap rsaiy haasal karna chahti hayn۔ astfsar pramp kwiyr pyramytrza tak rsaiy kay l get ghyt () ، ghytal () ، aur () jesay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔aap tamam astfsar pyramytr kyza ki ayk saf haasal karnay kay liye klydwn ki praprty ka bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan ayk aysy msaal hay jo astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy kay mkhtlf tarykwn ko zaahar krty haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynghwnynt (): batal {kant questeraparams = this.route.queryparammap.subscribe (pyrams => {// ayk wahad astfsar pyramytr wylyw CONT pyramwlyw = pyrams.yt ('pyram nam') ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyramwlyw) tak rsaiy haasal karain ؛ // kesi astfsar pyramytr ki tamam akdar ko srny kramalys = pyrams۔ ghytl ('pyram namha۔') ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyramwalywza) ؛ // chyk karain keh aya koi astfsar pyramytr mwjwd hay kywnpyrams.kys ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyramkyza) ؛}) ؛} astfsar prymp praprty aap ko mwjwdha rastay sy wabstha astfsar pyramytrza kay sath bazayaft aur kam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha aap kay kwnyy ayply kyshn main astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy aur hayra phyry ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main [rwtr lnk] aur rwtr lnkyktyw aapshn kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: [rwtr lnk] hadayt namha aur rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza kwnyy rwtngh main mkhtlf fnkshnlyan mhaya karty hayn: [rwtr lnk]: [rwtr lnk] hadayt namha lnks bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo aap kay kwnyy ayply kyshn kay andr mkhtlf rastwn par tshryf la jatay hayn۔yha aap ko rastay kay rastay par pabnd krkay nywyghyshn lnk ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔jb lnk par klk kya jata hay tou ، kwnyy ka rwtr mkhsawsa rwt par jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، aap [rwtr lnk] ko mndrjha zayl astamal krsktay hayn: htmlcopy kwda

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main srws kay sath kyn ayktywyt antrfys ka astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، bwjh kay bchay praprty ko sst madaywl ko bay bnyad tawr par lwda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jb aap wabstha rastha chalw hawjatay hain tou yeh rn taim kay wkt mthark tawr par ayk madaywl draamd karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔mthark ampwrt nhaw ko is ko haasal karnay kay l the lwdachwldayn praprty kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan keh aap kwnyy rwtngh main mthark draamd kay nhaw kay sath lwdachwlyn praprty ka astamal kesay krsktay hayn: lwdachyndaryn praprty ki wzuahat kryn: rwt ki tshkyl main ، lwdachyndaryn praprty ko rastay kay sath btaiyn۔wha madaywl jsay aap sst bwjh karna chahti hayn۔mthark ampwrt nhaw ka astamal karty hoey rastay ki wzuahat ki jany chahaiay۔.lazymodule)}] ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، lwdachylyn praprty ko ayk aysay fnkshn par syt kya gaya hay jo mthark tawr par './lazy/lazy.module' fail sy lazaymwdawl ko draamd krta haay۔ampwrt () fnkshn ayk wadha lwtata hay jo madaywl par hal hawta haay۔madaywl jo aap sst bwjh karna chahti hain ، is madaywl sy mtalk rastwn ki wzuahat karna ykyny bnaiyn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwnst rastwn: rwts = [{rastha: '' ، jza: lazaykwmypynt} ، // sst lwly waly madaywl sy mtalk dyghr rastay] ؛ngmodule ({draamdat: [routermodule.forchild (rastay)] ، braamdat: [rwtrmwdawl]}) klas lazaymwdawl braamd karain {{mzakwrha bala msaal main ، lazaymwdawl ayk alyhadha madaywl hay js kay apnay rastwn kay sath haay۔madaywl knfyghryshn main raؤtr mwdaywl.fwrmdawl (rwts) aur aykspwrt rwtr mwdal ko draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn۔ aap sst bwjh waly madaywl kay liye mkhsawsa rastwn ki wzuahat kar saktay hayn۔lwdachwlyn praprty ka astamal karty hoey sst bhry hui madaywl۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwnst rwts: rwts = [// dusray rastay {rastha: 'kahal' ، lwdachnyn: () => draamd ('./ sst/sst.mwdawl')۔ phir (aym (aym=> m.lazymodule)} ، // dusray rastay]@@ngmodule ({draamdat: [routermodule.forroot (rastay)] ، braamdat: [rwtrmwdawl]}) klas sy mtalk klas sy mtalk amwr ki kymt {{las mndrjha bala msaal kay tawr par ، kahaly sy bhray hawiaymadaywl ko mthark draamd syntax.note kay sath lwdachwldayn praprty ki wzuahat krkay aafywtngh mwdawl main shaml kya jata hay keh aap ko rwtrmwdawl ko draamd karna chahaiay۔ rwt rwtngh madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liay۔jb wabstha rastha chalw hawjata hay tou mtzuad tawr par bhry hui haay۔aap ki ayply kyshn kay abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko bhatr bnanay kay bad ، sst bhry hui madaywl aur is kay rastwn ko sirf lwda kya jaye gha۔tamyr kay aml kay doran bhry hui madaywl۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwt۔ bchwn ki praprty ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main kynyktyw tychylda antrfys rwt ghardaza ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat krsktay hayn۔yha khasa tawr par ayk drjha bndy kay rastay main bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat kay l multiple mtadd mhaafzawn kay sath mil kar astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ jab aap kay pas ayk ya zayada bchwn kay rastwn kay sath waldyn ka rastha hawta hay tou ، kynyktywytchlda antrfys aap ko kesi mhaafza ya ghardaza kay ayk syt ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔bchwn kay tamam rastwn par laghw hawgha۔as antrfys ka mksad waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay tamam rastwn ki hafazat kay liye ayk mrkzay mykanzam fraham karna haay۔ yahan keh aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn kay sath kynyktywytytychylda antrfys ka astamal krsktay hayn: kynyktywytyklda antrfys ko nafza kryn: ayk gharda klas bnaiyn aur is par aml draamd kryn۔kynyktyw tychylda antrfys۔rwtstytysnap shat): kabl mshahadha <bwlyn |urltree> |wadha <bwlyn |urltree> |bwlyn |urltree {// bchwn kay rastwn kay liye gharda mntak drst lwtta haay۔// ya nywyghyshn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye ghalat ya urltree waps kryn}}}}}}}.as tarykha kar ko rwtr nay is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye blaya hay keh aya bchwn kay rastwn ko chalw kya jana chahaiay ya nhayn۔ rwtngh madaywl main gharda ki tshkyl kryn: rwtngh madaywl main jahan aap waldyn kay rastay ki wzuahat karty hain js main bchwn kay rastay hawtay hain ، gharda ko trtyb dynwaldyn kay rastay ki kynyktywytychylda praprty۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwnst rwts: rastay = [{rastha: 'waldyn' ، jzaw: pyrnt kmpwynty ، kynyktywytychylda: [maiy gharda] ، bchay: [// bchwn kay rastay]}] above mzakwrha bala msaal main ، maiy gharda hay ، maiy gharda aai ays haaywaldyn kay rastay ki kynyktyw tychylda praprty main shaml kya ghya۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh maiy gharda kay zaryaha byan krdha ghardaza ka atalak 'waldyn' kay rwt kay that bchwn kay tamam rastwn par kya jaye gha۔ aap kynyktywtyklda praprty ko mhaafzawn ki ayk saf fraham krkay mtadd mhaafzawn ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ghardaza ko is trtyb main phansy di jaye gi js ki woh fharst main hayn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaykanyktywytytychlda: [my gharda 1 ، maiy gharda 2 ، maiy gharda 3] ، mzakwrha bala msaal main ، maiy gharda 1 ، maiy gharda 2 ، aur maiy gharda 3 tyn alag alag mhaafza hain jo bchay ki hafazat kay liye astamal kyay jien ghay۔rwts۔ kay zaryaha kynyktyw tychylda antrfys ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aysay mhaafzawn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo khasa tawr par waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔as sy aap ko pychydha ajazat ya twsayk ki mntak ko nafza karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo bchwn kay rastwn kay ayk ghrwp par laghw hawta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh un tak rsaiy sy kbl un ki hafazat ki jaiay۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main rshtha dar rastwn aur astfsar pyrm kay sath rwtr daat nywyghyt baiwrl () ka tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، rwtr.nwyghyt baiwrl () ka tarykha ayk mkhsawsa yw aar ayl prwghram main tshryf la janay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ryplyswrl aapshn ، jab sch par syt kya jata hay tou ، braؤzar ki tarykh main mwjwdha yw aar ayl ki jghha niay yw aar ayl kay sath la jata hay ، mwjwdha yw aar ayl ko tarykh kay astyk sy mؤsar tarykay sy hata dyta haay۔ yahan aap rwtr ko kis tarah astamal krsktay hayn۔mtalwbha anhasaar: sab sy pehlay ، rwtr klas ko @kwnyy/rwtr sy jzaw ya khdmt main draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn jahan aap raؤtr۔ nywyghyt baiwrl () tarykha۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt { @kwnyy/rwtr 'say anjkshn lghaiyn anjkshn anjkshn lghaiyn۔raؤtr msaal: aghla ، ajzaaa ya khdmt kay tamyr knndha main rwtr msaal anjykshn kryn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwntrktr (njy rwtr: rwtr) {} rowter.navegatbyurl () tarykha astamal kryn: aap nywyghyt karnay kay liye Router.navegagatByurl () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ayk mkhsawsa yw aar ayl kw۔mtalwbha yw aar ayl ko pyramytr kay tawr par tarykha kay tawr par pas kryn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynwyghytytw ayksympl pyj (): batal {this.router.navegatbyurl ('/msaal' ، {tbdyl karnay wali shkl: sch}) ؛} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، nywyghytytw ayksmpl pyj () tarykha kar par tshryf la jata haay۔/msaal kay tawr par yw aar ayl raؤtr.nwyghyt baiwrl () tarykha ka astamal karty hawiay۔ksy shay ko dusray pyramytr kay tawr par pas krkay tbdyl karnay wala aapshn drst haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh mwjwdha yw aar ayl ko braؤzar ki tarykh main niay yw aar ayl kay sath tbdyl kya gaya haay۔aghr saarf braؤzar main byk btn par klyk krta hay tou ، nywyghyshn hony sy pehlay woh pchhlay yw aar ayl main waps nahin jaskyn ghay۔ agar tbdyl karain yw aar ayl fraham nahin kya jata hay ya ghalat par syt nahin kya jata hay tou ، nya yw aar ayl tarykh kay astyk main shaml kya jaye ga ، awrsaarf byk btn par klk krkay pchhlay yw aar ayl main waps ja sakta haay۔ nwt karain keh raؤtr daat nywyghyt baiwrl () tarykha nywyghyshn kay liye dusray akhtyarat ko bhi kbwl krskta hay ، jesay astfsar pyrmza ، tkraay aur ryast۔yha akhtyarat aap ko nywyghyshn kay sath astfsar pyramytrza ، tkraay ، ya kstm astyt dayta ko pas karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ raؤtr.nwyghyt baiwrl () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، tbdyl karain ، aap braؤzar ki tarykh main mwjwdha yw aar ayl ki jghha la kar ayk niay yw aar ayl main tshryf la jasktay hayn۔، saarf kay liye baghair kesi nywyghyshn ka tjrbha fraham krna۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr mwdal.fwrchwlda () aur rwtrmwdawl۔ fwrwrwt () kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، dono kynyktywtyt aur kynyktywytychylda rwt gharda antrfys hain jo aap ko rastwn tak rsaiy par kabw panay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔taham ، woh apnay astamal aur dairha kar main mkhtlf hayn: kynyktywtyt: kynyktywyt antrfys anfrady rastwn ki hafazat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha aap ko kesi gharda ya mhaafzawn kay ayk syt ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo is bat ka tayn krta hay keh aya kesi khasa rastay ko chalw kya jaskta hay ya nhayn۔ksy khasa rwt par tshryf latay wkt kyn ayktywyt gharda ka andazaha kya jata haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {kynyktywtyt ، ayktywytyt raؤstnp shat ، rwtstytsnap shat ، urltree 'say'@kwnyy/raؤtr '؛ ampwrt {mshahadha {aar ayks jay ays klas maiyghghwrda sy mtalk}kynyktywyt (rwt: ayktywytyda rwtsnap shat ، ryast: rwtstyts nap shat): mshahadha karnay wala <bwlyn |urltree> |wadha <bwlyn |urltree> |bwlyn |urltree {// rwt ki wapsy kay liye gharda mntak drst ؛// ya nywyghyshn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye ghalat ya urltree waps kryn}}}}}}} msaal kay tawr par ، maiy gharda klas kyn ayktywyt antrfys ko nafza krty hay aur kynyktywyt tarykha kay liye aml draamd fraham krty haay۔as tarykha kar ko rwtr nay is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye blaya hay keh aya rastha chalw kya jaskta hay ya nhayn۔ kynyktywytytychlda: kynyktywytychylda antrfys waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha aap ko kesi gharda ya mhaafzawn kay syt ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo is bat ka tayn krta hay keh waldyn kay rastay main mwjwd tamam bchwn kay rastay chalw hawsktay hain ya nhayn۔waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay kesi bhi rastwn par tshryf la jatay wkt kynyktywytychylda gharda ka andazaha kya jata haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {kynyktywytychylda ، ayktywytyt rwtsnap shat ، rwtstytysnap shat ، urltree 'say'@kwnyy/raؤtr 'say' rass '؛aykspwrt klas maiy gharda nay kynyktywytychylda {kynyktywytychylda (rwt: ayktywytyda rwtsnap shat ، ryast: rwtstytysnap shat) ka atalak kya: mshahadha karnay wala <bwlyn |urltree> |wadha <bwlyn |urltree> |bwlyn |urltree {// bchwn kay rastwn kay liye gharda mntak drst lwtta haay۔// ya nywyghyshn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye ghalat ya urltree waps kryn}}}}}}}.as tarykha kar ko rwtr nay is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye blaya hay keh aya waldyn kay rastay main mwjwd bchwn kay tamam rastwn ko chalw kya jaskta hay ya nhayn۔ khlasaha karnay kay liay: kynykytyt anfrady rastwn ki hafazat kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur kesi khasa rwt par tshryf la janay kay wkt is ka andazaha kya jata haay۔waldyn kay rastay main rastay aur is ka andazaha is wkt kya jata hay jab waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay kesi bhi rastay par tshryf la jatay hayn۔ dono kyntytytyt aur kynyktywytychylda ghardaza ko aap kay kwnyy ayply kyshn main rastwn tak jama rsaiy kntrwl fraham karnay kay liye mil kar astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main nywyghyshn astart aywnt ko snbhalnay kay liye aap raؤtr.aywns.sbyskraib () tarykha ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، ayktywytyt rwt۔ dayta praprty aap ko kesi rastay sy wabstha dayta tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha kstm dayta ko kesi rastay par mntkl karnay aur is dayta ko bazayaft karnay ka ayk tarykha mhaya krta hay jab rastha chalw hawta haay۔ yahan keh aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywytyt rwt۔ dayta praprty ko kis tarah astamal krsktay hayn: kesi rastay kay liye dayta ki wzuahat kryn: apnay rastay ki trtyb main ، dayta ki wzuahat karain ، dayta ki wzuahat kryn۔ksy khasa rastay kay liye praprty۔yha praprty aap ko rwt kay sath kstm dayta ko mnslk karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwnst rastwn: rastay = [{rastha: 'msaal' ، jzaw: msaal kay tawr par ، aadad wa shmar: {anwan: 'msaal kay safhaay' ، tfsayl: 'yha ayk msaal ka safhaha haay'}}] ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، dayta praprty ko 'msaal' kay rastay main shaml kya jata haay۔as main kstm dayta shaml hay jesay rwt sy wabstha anwan aur tfsayl۔ jzaw main mwjwd aadad wa shmar ki rsaiy: chalw rwt kay mtaabk jzaw main ، aap ayktywytyt rwt.dayta praprty ka astamal karty hoey dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔kwnyy/kwr '؛ ampwrt {ayktywyt rwt} say'@kwnyy/rwtr '؛@jzaw ({// jzaw ki zurwrt kay mtaabk dayta ka astamal kryn}) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، ayktywyt rwt ko jzaw kay knstrktr main anjkshn lghaya jata haay۔ngoninit () kay tarykha kar main ، aap ayktywytyt raؤt.dayta praprty ko sbskraib krsktay hain aur rwt sy wabstha kstm dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔sbskrpshn kay andr ، aap mkhsawsa dayta praprtyza nkal saktay hain aur apnay jzaw main zurwrt kay mtaabk un Question: kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywytda raؤt.wrl praprty ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، path myt praprty ka astamal is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye kya jata hay keh rwtr ko kesi rastay sy yw aar ayl tabkay sy kis tarah mlna chahaiay۔as ka astamal kesi mkhsawsa rwt ki trtyb kay liye rwt mmasal hakmt amly ko kntrwl karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ path mych praprty mndrjha zayl akdar main sy ayk la sakti haay: 'sabkha': agar path mych ki wzuahat nahin ki hogi hay tou yeh pehlay sy taay shuda kymt haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh rwtr drkhwast shuda yw aar ayl tabkay sy rwt ki trtyb main ayk sabkha kay tawr par byan krdha rastay sy mmasal hawgha۔dwsray lfzawn main ، rwtr mmasal hoga agar yw aar ayl mkhsawsa rastay sy shrwa hawta haay۔'/msaal' ، '/msaal/bchay' ، '/msaal/msaal/123' ، aur isi tarah kay URLs kay liye mych karain ghay۔ 'fl': is kdr sy yeh wazuha hawta hay keh rwtr ko drkhwast krdha yw aar ayl tabkay ko ram main mkhsawsa rastay sy mlna chahaiay۔mkml tabkha kay tawr par rwt knfyghryshn۔as kay liye poray yw aar ayl tabkay kay liye ayk ayn mtaabk mych ki zurwrt haay۔ayn mtaabk URL '/msaal' kay liye sirf mych hawgha۔yha '/msaal/bchay' ya '/example/123'' jesay URL sy mmasal nahin hawgha۔ path mych praprty ka mksad rwtr kay mmasal slwk ko kntrwl karna hay aur is bat ka tayn karna hay keh drkhwast ki hogi URL tabkha ko rastay kay rastay sy kitna kryb sy hona chahaiay۔as sy aap ko yeh wzuahat karnay ki ajazat mlty hay keh aya rwtr ko rastay ko ayk sabkha smjhna chahaiay ya kesi ayn mtaabk mych ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ jab aap waldyn kay rastay kay that bchwn kay rastay ya pyramytraizada rwt hawtay hain tou 'pryfks' ki dayfalt wylyw mfyd hawty haay۔yha waldyn kay rastay ko is sy mtalkha jzaw sy mlnay aur lwda karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، js sy bchwn ko apnay mkhsawsa rastwn ko snbhalnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ dusri taraf ، 'mkml' mfyd hay jab aap kesi khasa rastay kay liye kesi khasa rastay kay liye ayn mtaabk mych ko ykyny bnana chahti hayn۔ya yw aar ayl main azuafy tabkat۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main kesi fnkshn kay sath aap kynlwda antrfys ka astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، mwjwdha rastay kay astfsar pyramytrza tak rsaiy kay liye ayktywytyda raؤt۔ kwiyrprmp praprty ka astamal kya jata haay۔yha yw aar ayl sy astfsar kay pyramytrza ko bazayaft karnay aur un kay sath apnay jzaw main kam karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ yahan keh aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywytyda raؤt۔ kwiyrprmp praprty ko kis tarah astamal krsktay hayn: mtalwbha anhasaar draamd kryn: pehlay ، @ sy ayktywytyda rwt klas draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn۔kwnyy/rwtr js jzaw main aap astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal karna chahti hayn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {ayktywytyda raؤt} sy '@kwnyy/rwtr' ؛ ayktywyt raؤt msaal kay tawr par anjykshn kryn: aghla ، ajzaaa kay knstrktr main ayktywytyda rwt msaal ko anjykshn kryn۔rwt: ayktywyt rwt) {} astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal kryn: aap apnay ajzaaa main as. route.queryparammap praprty ka astamal karty hoey astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔astfsar pyramytrza kwnt ID = pyrams۔ ghyt ('ID') ؛ const name = params.get ('nam') ؛ // zurwrt kay mtaabk astfsar kay pyramytrza ka astamal kryn})} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، ayktywyt rwt ko jzaw main dakhl kya gaya haay۔knstrktrngoninit () kay tarykha kar main ، aap astfsar kay pyramytrza ko bazayaft karnay kay liye as. route.queryparammap praprty ko sbskraib krsktay hayn۔sbskrpshn kay andr ، aap un kay namwn kay zaryaha astfsar pyramytrza ki akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye pyramp aabjykt kay get () tarykha () ko astamal krsktay hayn۔ nwt karain keh astfsar pyramytrza aam tawr par URL main wazuha kyay jatay hayn؟alamt ، jysay؟ ID = 123 & nam = jan۔getParam () ka tarykha aap ko kesi mkhsawsa astfsar kay pyramytr ki kdr bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ agar koi astfsar pyramytr URL main mtadd bar zaahar hawta hay tou ، aap is sy wabstha tamam akdar ki ayk saf ko bazayaft karnay kay liye get () kay bjaiay getall () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔as astfsar pyramytr kay zaryaha۔as sy aap yw aar ayl kay astfsar pyramytrza main fraham krdha akdar ki bnyad par aml anjam denay ya apnay jzaw kay tarza aml ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay kabl bnatay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main kynyktywtyt aur kynday ayktywytyt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، [rwtr lnk] aur rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza nywyghyshn ko snbhalnay aur faal lnks par astail lghanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wha mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: [rwtr lnk]: [rwtr lnk] ayk hadayt hay jo aap kay kwnyy ayply kyshn main kesi khasa rastay par lnk bandhnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔jb aap ko lnk par klk kya jata hay tou yeh aap ko kesi mkhtlf rastay par janay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: HTMLCOPY kwda par jien ، [rwtr lnk] lnk ko /msaal kay rastay sy bandhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jb lnk par klk kya jata hay tou ، kwnyy ka rwtr mkhsawsa rastay par tshryf la jaye ga ، js ki wjha sy isi jzaw ko bhry hui haw۔ rwtr lnk ayktyw aapshnza: rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza ayk un pt praprty hay jo aap ko faal lnks kay tarza aml aur astail ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay ki ajazat dyty haay۔jb koi lnk faal hawta hay tou sy ays ays klasza ya dyghr astailngh ka atalak karnay kay liye rwtr lnkyktyw hadayt kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: HTMLCOPY kwda msaal kay tawr par lnk mzakwrha bala msaal main ، rwtr lnkyktyw ka astamal sy ays ays klas" ayktw "kw lnk par laghw karnay kay liye kya jata hay jab yeh mwjwdha faal rastay sy mtaabkt rkhta haay۔rwtr lnkyktyw aapshn un pt praprty {ayn mtaabk: sch} par syt ki hogi hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh lnk sirf is sawrt main faal smjha jaye ga jab mwjwdha rwt lnk kay hadf kay rastay sy balkl mmasal haay۔aghr ayn mtaabk syt nahin kya gaya hay ya ghalat par syt kya gaya hay tou ، lnk ko faal smjha jaye ga agar mwjwdha rastha lnk kay hadf waly rastay ka ayk chailda rwt haay۔ rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza praprty rwtr lnkyktyw daairyktyw kay tarza aml par azuafy kntrwl fraham krty hay aur aap ko shraita ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay ki ajazat dyty haay۔js kay that faal klas ko lnk daat kam par laghw kya jata hay ، [rwtr lnk] nywyghyshn kay liye kesi khasa rastay par lnk bandhnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jabky rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza ko faal lnks kay tarza aml aur astail ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo rwtr lnkyktyw kay sath mil kar kam karty hayn۔hadayt

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rshtha dar rastwn aur tkraay kay sath aap rwtr.nwyghyt () tarykha ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، kyn ayktywyt antrfys rwt ghardaza bnanay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo kesi khasa rastay tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karty hayn۔aap kesi khdmt main kynyktywyt antrfys ko nafza krsktay hain aur isy rwt par nywyghyshn ki ajazat denay sy pehlay ajazat ya dyghr chyk anjam denay kay liye rwt gharda kay tawr par astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan keh aap kwnyy rwtngh main srws kay sath kynyktywyt antrfys ka astamal kesay krsktay hayn: kynyktywyt ko nafza karnay wali ayk khdmt bnaiyn۔antrfys: ayk aysy khdmt bnaiyn jo kynyktywyt antrfys ko nafza kray aur is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye zurwry mntak fraham krta hay keh aya rastha chalw kya jaskta hay ya nhayn۔khdmt ko kynyktywyt antrfys sy kynyktywtyt tarykha par aml draamd karna chahaiay۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {anjykshn} sy '@kwnyy/kwr' ؛ draamd {kynyktywtyt ، ayktywytyt raؤstnp shat ، rwtstytysnap shat in '@kwnyy/raؤtr' ؛{kynyktywyt (rwt: ayktywytda raؤt ays ayn aay py shat ، ryast: rwtstyts nap shat): bwlyn {// apni ajazat ya rsaiy ki janch pratal yahan anjam dyn // agar rsaiy ki ajazat hay tou sahayha lwtaiyn ، ya ghalat dusri sawrt main sch waps ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، maiy ghardas srws kynyktywyt antrfys ko nafza krty hay aur kynyktywyt tarykha kay liye aml draamd fraham krty haay۔kynyktywyt tarykha kay andr ، aap zurwry chyk (jysay ajazat ، twsayk ، krdar par mbny rsaiy) anjam dy saktay hain takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh rastha chalw kya jaskta hay ya nhayn۔ khdmt ko rwt gharda ki haysayt sy fraham kryn: aap ko apnay rastay ki trtyb main ، aap ko zurwrt hay ، aap ko zurwrt haay۔aap un rastwn kay liye rwt gharda ki haysayt sy khdmt ki wzuahat karain js ki aap hafazat karna chahti hayn۔yha rastay ki kynyktywyt praprty main ya kesi mkhsawsa bchay kay rwt ki kynyktywyt praprty main khdmt shaml krkay kya jata haay۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {rwts '@kwnyy/rwtr' sy ؛khdmt '؛ ampwrt {mycompointent} mnjanb'.'mhafwza' rastay ki kynyktywyt praprty kw۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh 'mhafwza' rwt par nywyghyshn ki ajazat denay aur maikmpmnt ko pysh karnay sy pehlay ، maiy ghardas srws ko is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye drkhwast ki jaye gi keh aya rsaiy ki ajazat hay ya nhayn۔ khdmt ko rjstr kryn: yeh ykyny bnaiyn keh yeh kwnyy madaywl main ayk fraham knndha kay tawr par rjstryshn karain jahan yeh hawgha۔astamal shdha۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaym pwrt {ngmodule} sy '@kwnyy/kwr' ؛ draamd {myguardservice} mnjanb '، maiy ghardarwais ko madaywl kay fraham knndghan ki safwn main shaml kya jata hay ، js sy yeh anhasaar anjykshn kay liye dstyab hawta haay۔ kesi khdmt main kynyktywyt antrfys ko nafza karnay aur isy rwt gharda kay tawr par fraham karnay kay bad ، aap kesi khasa rastay par nywyghyshn ki ajazat denay sy pehlay kstm ayksys kntrwl chyk anjam dy saktay hayn۔aap ki kwnyy ayply kyshn myn۔as ki mdd sy aap apni drkhwast ki zurwryat ki bnyad par amdha anaj ki ajazat ya rsaiy ki dyghr pabndywn ko nafza krsktay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr prlwdar ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، rwt۔ bchwn ki praprty waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay rastwn ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha aap ko ghhwnsla ya drjha bndy kay rwtngh dahanchay bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jahan bchwn kay rastwn ko waldyn kay rastay ki awlad kay tawr par byan kya jata haay۔ rwt ka mksad۔ bchwn ki jaiydad ayk mshtrkha waldyn kay rastay kay that mtalkha rastwn ko mnzam karna aur ghrwp karna haay۔yha khasa tawr par mfyd hay jab aap kay pas pychydha atalak ki trtyb ya khsawsayat hain jn main rwtngh ki ayk sy zayada staha ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ rwt kay astamal ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ayk msaal haay۔ bchwn: taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwnst rwts: rastay = [{rastha: 'daysh bwrda' ، jzaw: daysh bwrda kampynt ، bchay.'، ajzaaa: trtybat ka mkablha}]} ، // dusray aaly drjay kay rastay ...] mzakwrha bala msaal main ، rastay' daysh bwrda 'kay sath waldyn ka rastha is kay jzaw kay tawr par daysh bwrdakmpryshn kay sath byan kya gaya haay۔bchwn ki jaiydad 'daysh bwrda' rwt kay liye bchwn kay rastwn ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ bchwn kay sray kay sath ، aap azuafy rastwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo waldyn kay rastay ki awlad hayn۔as maamlay main ، 'jaizaha' ، 'rpwrts' ، aur 'trtybat' 'daysh bwrda' rwt kay bchwn kay rastay hayn۔ ghhwnsla karnay waly rastay is tarah sy ، aap apni drkhwast kay mkhtlf hasawn kay liye alag alag ajzaaa aur aaraa ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔jb kesi bchay kay rastay par tshryf la jatay hain tou ، waldyn kay rastay kay jzaw ko bchwn kay rastay kay jzaw kay sath bhra diya jaye ga ، js sy ayk drjha bndy nywyghyshn dahanchha tshkyl diya jaye gha۔ rwt۔ bchwn ki praprty aap ko rwt kay drjha bndy ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hay ، aur aap ko apni drkhwast ki rwtngh trtyb ko tbdyl karnay aur trtyb denay kay kabl bnata haay۔yha pychydha ayply kyshnza ko tshkyl denay main mdd krta hay aur ghhrylw rastwn ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main aykstra aapshn kay sath aap rwtr daat nywyghyt () tarykha ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، rwtr.nwyghyt baiwrl () ka tarykha rwtr ka astamal karty hoey ayk mkhsawsa yw aar ayl main tshryf la janay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aap apni drkhwast kay andr tshryf lanay kay liye is tarykha kar kay sath rshtha dar rastwn aur astfsar kay pyramytrza ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ aap rshtha dar rastwn aur astfsar kay pyramytrza kay sath raؤtr daat nywyghyt bwrl () ko kis tarah astamal krsktay hayn: mtalwbha anhasaar draamd kryn: pehlay ، @ sy rwtr klas draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn۔kwnyy/rwtr js jzaw main aap rwtr astamal karna chahti hayn۔ nywyghyt baiwrl ().yw aar ayl ayk rshtha dar rastha hawskta hay ، jo mwjwdha rwt par mbny hay ، aur is main astfsar pyramytrza shaml hawsktay hayn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynwyghytytw ayksplympl () {kanstwr kwiyr pyrams = {ID: 123 ، nam: 'msaal'} ؛this.router.navegatByurl ('/msaal؟ pyram 1 = wylyw 1 aur pyram 2 = wylyw 2' ، {astfsar pyrayms})} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، nywyghytytw ayksplympl () ka tarykha rwtr daat nywyghyt baiwrl () kay astamal ko zaahar krta haay۔yha swal pyramytrza kay pyram 1 = wylyw 1 aur pyram 2 = wylyw 2'. kay sath /msaal kay rastay par jata haay۔ rshtha dar rastha /msaal mwjwdha rastay par mbny haay۔aghr mwjwdha rastha /daysh bwrda hay tou ، ntyjay main mtalk URL /daysh bwrda /msaal hawgha؟ pyram 1 = wylyw 1 aur pyram 2 = wylyw 2۔aghr mwjwdha rastha /dwsra hay tou ، ntyjay main mtalk url /other/example؟param1=value1&param2=value2. yeh astfsar pyrams aabjykt raؤtr daat nywyghyt baiwrl () ko dusri dlyl kay tawr par fraham kya gaya hay ، js sy aap ko yw aar ayl kay liye astfsar pyramytrza ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔as msaal main ، astfsar pyrams aabjykt main pyramytrza ID aur nam shaml hain ، jo url.note main shaml kya jaye gha۔mtalkha rastay aur astfsar pyramytrza ، aap mwjwdha rastay ki bnyad par apni kwnyy ayply kyshn main tshryf la saktay hain aur yw aar ayl main astfsar pyramytrza shaml krsktay hayn۔yha tarykha aap ko prwghram kay sath nywyghyshn ko mthark karnay aur zurwrt kay mtaabk astfsar pyramytrza kay zaryaay dayta ko mntkl karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main akhtyary aur mtalwbha pyramytrza main kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، rwtngh madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye rwtr madal kay zaryaha do tarykay fraham kyay gaye hayn: fwrda () aur fwrrwt ()۔yha tarykay is sy mkhtlf hain keh woh rwtngh madaywl ki tkhlyk aur rastwn ki rjstryshn ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn۔ya ayk sst bhry hui madaywl۔ yeh ampwrt praprty ka astamal karty hoey fychr madaywl ki rwtngh madaywl fail kay andr kaha jata haay۔ fwrs () tarykha kar rwtr srws ki niy msaal bnaiay baghair fychr madaywl kay rastwn ko rjstr krta haay۔yha rwt madaywl kay rwtr kay rastwn kay sath rastwn ko zum krta hay ۔fytchr madaywlza kay apnay bchwn kay rastay far chlda () ka astamal karty hoey hawsktay hain ، aur woh dusray madaywlza main draamd hawsktay hayn۔: fwrrwt () ko astamal kya jata hay jab aap ki ayply kyshn kay rwt madaywl kay rwtngh madaywl ki tshkyl karty wkt ، aam tawr par Appmodule.it ko draamd ki praprty ka astamal karty hoey rwt madaywl ki rwtngh madaywl fail main kaha jata haay۔ fwrrwt () tarykha raؤtr ki ayk niy msaal tkhlyk krta haay۔khdmt aur rwt madaywl kay liye rastwn ko tshkyl dyta haay۔ isy sirf ayk bar rwt madaywl main kaha jana chahaiay ، aur yeh rwtr srws ko poray ayply kyshn main snghltn kay tawr par fraham krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal: rwtrmwdawl۔ fwrwrwt (rastay) fwrs kay darmiyan klydy frk ()awr fwrwrwt () is main jhwt bwlta hay keh woh rwtr srws ki tkhlyk aur rastwn ki rjstryshn ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn۔rwtr srws ki ayk niy msaal bnanay aur rastwn ko tshkyl denay kay liye rwt madaywl kay liye fwrrwt () ka astamal kya jata hay ، jabky fwrschda () ko rwtr srws ki niy msaal bnaiay baghair rwts ko rjstr karnay kay liye fychr madaywl kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh astamal karna aham haaymnasb tarykha kar par mbny mnasb tarykha kar par mbny rwtngh ki mnasb trtyb ko ykyny bnanay aur rwt ki taryfwn kay mabyn tnazaaat sy bchnay kay liay۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main askyplwkyshn chynj praprty kay sath rwtr daat nywyghyt () tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، aap rwtr kay wakaat ko sbskraib karnay aur isi kay mtaabk snbhalnay kay liye rwtr.aywnts۔ sbskraib () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔nywyghyshn astart aywnt ko khasa tawr par snbhalnay kay l you ، aap un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: mtalwbha anhasaar draamd kryn: @kwnyy/raؤtr sy rwtr aur nywyghyshn astart klas draamd kryn۔apnay ajzaaa ya srws kay knstrktr main raؤtr msaal kay tawr par anjykshn kryn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwntrktr (njy rwtr: rwtr) {} nywyghyshn astart aywnt ko sbskraib kryn: raؤtr ka astamal kryn۔ mshahadha karnay waly aur is ko sbskraib kryn۔sbskrpshn kay andr ، nywyghyshn astart aywnt ki janch pratal karain aur mtalwbha aml anjam dyn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynghwnyt () {this.router.events.subscribe (wakaha => {aghr (wakaha nywyghyshn astart) {// nywyghyshn astart aywnt knswl.lwgh (hayndal karain ('nywyghyshn ka aaghaza hawa! Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rastay aur ayktywyt rwt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، kynyktywtyt aur kynday ayktywytyt do mkhtlf rwt ghardaza hain jo baltrtyb kesi khasa rastay par aur janay waly nywyghyshn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat ka ayk khraby yeh haay: kynyktywtyt: kynyktywtyt gharda ka astamal is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye kya jata hay keh aya kesi saarf ko kesi mkhsawsa rwt par tshryf la janay ki ajazat hay ya nhayn۔ yeh rwt ko chalw karnay (lwdangh) sy pehlay hi aml main laya jata hay aur waps shuda bwlyn ki bnyad par nywyghyshn ki ajazat dyta hay ya blaks nywyghyshn ki ajazat dyta haay۔value.FANActivate gharda drst lwtta hay tou ، nywyghyshn ki ajazat hay ، aur rastha chalw hawjata haay۔ agar kyn ayktywyt gharda ghalat ya URLTERE shay ko waps krta hay tou ، nywyghyshn ko msdwd krdya jata hay ، aur saarf ko ry daairykt kya jata hay ya mwjwdha safhaay par rhata hay ، is par mnhasar haay۔waps aanay wali kymt۔ aap ayk rwt par mtadd kynyktywyt ghardaza ko tfwyzu krsktay hain ، aur un sab ko nywyghyshn ko aaghay brahnay kay l true schaiy waps karna hawghy۔mwjwdha rwt ko chhwratay wkt phansy di jati hay aur waps shuda bwlyn wylyw ki bnyad par nywyghyshn ki ajazat dyta hay ya blak krta haay۔ agar kynday ayktywyt gharda waps aajata hay tou ، nywyghyshn ki ajazat hay ، aur saarf mwjwdha rwt chhwra sakta haay۔ agar kynday ayktywyt gharda ghalat ya urltree aabjykt ko waps krta haay۔، nywyghyshn ko msdwd krdya gaya hay ، aur saarf mwjwdha rwt par rhata haay۔ isi tarah kyntykytw karnay kay liye ، aap mtadd kyndaykytyt ghardaza ko kesi rastay par tfwyzu krsktay hain ، aur un sab ko nywyghyshn ko aaghay brahnay kay l true drst lwtna hawgha۔ksy khasa rastay par tshryf la jasktay hain ، jabky kynday ayktywyt ko kntrwl krta hay keh aya koi saarf mwjwdha rastay sy door hawskta haay۔wha nywyghyshn pabndywn ko nafza karnay main lchk fraham karty hain aur aap ko apni drkhwast ki zurwryat ki bnyad par kstm mntak ko nafza karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main raؤtyrsystryty antrfys ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main kynyktywytyklda gharda ka mksad kya haay؟

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main jzaw msaal kay sath aap kynday ayktywytyghadaarda antrfys ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، kynday ayktywytyghadaarda antrfys ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya kesi jzaw ko ghair faal kya jaskta hay ya nhayn۔yha kesi jzaw sy door hony ki ajazat denay sy pehlay tsadyk kay l ask pwchhnay ya kuch chykwn ko anjam denay kay liye ayk tarykha kar mhaya krta haay۔ ajzaaa ki msaal kay sath kyndayktywytryj antrfys ka astamal karnay kay l these ، un akdamat par aml kryn: ayk gharda klas bnaiyn jo kynday ayktywtyw gharda antrfys ko nafza kray۔as klas main yeh mntak par mushtamil hoga keh aya jzaw ko ghair faal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr aur rwtrmwdawl main kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، rwtr aur rwtr mwdal mkhtlf krdar ada karty hain aur mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: rwtr: rwtr ayk aysy khdmt hay jo kwnyywlr kay @kwnyy/rwtr pykyj kay zaryaha fraham ki hogi haay۔yha aap ki drkhwast main nywyghyshn aur rwtngh faalyt ka antzaam karnay ka zamha dar haay۔rwtr aap ko mkhtlf rastwn kay mabyn tshryf la janay ، nywyghyshn aywnts ، rsaiy kay rwt pyramytrza ، astfsar pyramytrza ، aur rwt dayta ko snnay aur nywyghyshn sy mtalk dyghr kamwn ko prwghram kay mtaabk anjam denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aap apnay ajzaaa main rwtr srws anjykshn krsktay hain

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywytyda rwt۔ kwwryprams praprty ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، ayktywyt rwt kesi rastay kay baray main malwmat tak rsaiy fraham krta hay ، js main rastay sy wabstha astfsar pyramytrza bhi shaml hayn۔ayktywytyda raؤt۔ kwiyrparams praprty aap ko mwjwdha rwt sy astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ yahan aap ayktywytyda raؤt ko astamal krsktay hayn۔ kwiry pyram praprty: apnay jzaw main mtalwbha madaywl draamd kryn: taip askrpt kwdaympwrt {ayktywytyt rwt} sy '@anjwlr/rwtr' sy 'your apnay ajzaaa kay knstrktr main ayktywytyda raؤt ko anjykshn kryn: taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwntrktr (njy rwt: ayktywytyda rwt) {} apnay jzaw kay kwda main ayktywyt rwt ki kwiry pyrams praprty tak rsaiy haasal kryn۔aap yeh bat Ngoninit Lifecycle hak ya kesi aur mnasb tarykha main krsktay hayn: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynghwnyt () {this.route.queryparams.subscribe (pyrams => {// astfsar pyramytrza ko pyram 1 = pyrams ['pyram 1'] ؛= pyrams ['pyram 2'] ؛ // astfsar pyramytrza knswl.lagh (pyram 1) ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyram 2) ؛}) ؛} kwiry pyrams swskraib () kay tarykha kar kay sath koi zurwry kam anjam dyn۔pyramytr aabjykt pyrams ka astamal karty hoey pyramytrza۔pyrams aabjykt ayk jawa askrpt aabjykt hay js main klydy kdr kay jwraay hawtay hain jo astfsar kay pyramytrza ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ aap pyramytr kay nam ko klyd kay tawr par astamal karty hoey ayk mkhsawsa astfsar pyramytr tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain ، jesay ، pyrams ['pyram 1']aap ki drkhwast ki zurwryat par mbny astfsar pyramytrza۔ ayktywytyda raؤt۔ kwiryprams praprty ayk kabl mshahadha hay ، lhazaa sbskraib () kay tarykha kar ka astamal aap ko astfsar kay pyramytrza main tbdylywn par rd aml zaahar karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jab rastha tbdyl hawta haay۔-route؟ param1 = value1 & param2 = value2 ، mzakwrha bala kwda pyram 1 aur pyram 2 ki akdar ko baltrtyb 'wylyw 1' aur 'wylyw 2' kay tawr par lagh un kray gha۔aap ki kwnyy ayply kyshn main ayk mkhsawsa rastay kay sath۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main lwkyshn astryty antrfys ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، mkamat ki tamyr ka antrfys braؤzar kay yw aar ayl aur tarykh ko snbhalnay kay liye hakmt amly fraham karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha yw aar ayl main hayra phyry karnay ، mwjwdha yw aar ayl ryast ko prahnay ، aur braؤzar ki tarykh kay sath bat chyt karnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat krta haay۔ mkamat ki tamyraty antrfys ka bnyady mksad yw aar ayl mynjmnt ki bnyady nfaza ki tfsaylat ko khlasaha karna hay aur mkhtlf hakmt amlywn ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dena haay۔kwnyy mkamat ki tamyraty antrfys kay mkhtlf nfaza fraham krta hay ، jesay path lwkyshn astryty aur hayshlwkyshn astryty ، jo yw aar ayl mynjmnt ko mkhtlf nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey snbhaltay hayn۔ mkamat ki tamyraty antrfys ka astamal karty hoey ، aap kntrwl krsktay hain keh kwnyy braؤzar kay yw aar ayl aur tarykh ko kis tarah snbhalta hay ، aur apni par mbny mnasb hakmt amly ka antkhab kryn۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main astfsar pyram shyndalngh praprty kay sath rwtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، rwtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kar ko prwghram kay sath kesi mkhtlf rastay par janay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔raؤtr ki kwiry pyramshyndalngh praprty۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kar ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh nywyghyshn kay doran astfsar kay pyramytrza ko kis tarah snbhala jata haay۔ astfsar pyram shyndalngh praprty main mndrjha zayl akdar hawskty hayn: 'anzumam': yeh kdr niay astfsar kay pyramytrza ko mwjwdha astfsar kay pyramytrza kay sath zum krty haay۔aghr koi astfsar pyramytr pehlay hi mwjwd hay tou ، isy niy kymt kay sath awwr rait kya jaye gha۔aghr yeh mwjwd nahin hay tou ، is ko shaml kya jaye gha۔ 'prysrw': yeh kdr

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr prlwdar srws ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: main aljhn kay liye mazart khwaha hon ، lekin stmbr 2021 main meray alm kay kt aaf kay tawr par ، kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr prlwdar namy koi blt un srws nahin haay۔lhazaa ، main is kay mksad ya astamal kay baray main mkhsawsa malwmat fraham nahin krskta۔ taham ، main kwnyy rwtngh main pry lwdangh kay tsawr kay baray main amwmy malwmat fraham krskta hawn۔pry lwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ps mnzar main sst bwjh waly madaywlza ko lwda karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، js sy kwnyy ayply kyshn ki mjmway karkrdghy aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔ dayfalt kay zaryaha ، jab saarf kesi aysay rastay par jata hay jab un ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as sy takhyr ka taarf hawskta hay kywnkha madaywl ko pysh karnay sy pehlay srwr sy lanay ki zurwrt haay۔pry lwdangh aap ko abtdaiy drkhwast kay bwjh kay doran ya jab saarf ayply kyshn kay sath bat chyt kar raha hay tou un madaywlza ko pehlay sy lwda karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، takha zurwrt pranay par woh aasany sy dstyab hawn۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn kay sath kynyktywytyklda antrfys ka astamal kesay karty hayn؟

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main HTTPClientTestingModule ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: HTTPClientTestingModule ayk madaywl hay jo kwnyy tystngh frym wrk kay zaryaha fraham kya jata hay jo khasa tawr par kwda ki ywnt tystngh ki shawlt kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay jo HTTPClient srws ka astamal krta haay۔yha aap ko HTTP ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ka mzaak araanay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo aap kay kwnyy ajzaaa aur khdmat ki janch kay liye ayk kntrwl mahawl fraham krta hay jo HTTP mwasalat par anhasaar karty hayn۔ HTTPClientTestingModule ka bnyady mksad yeh hay keh asal HTTP psdyd ko mzaak kay nfaza kay sath tbdyl kya jaiay۔as sy aap ko HTTP ki drkhwastwn ki nkaly karnay aur mtwka rdaml ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat mlty hay js main hakykt main hakyky nyt wrk kal kyay bghyr۔

Question: aap kwnyy main ywnt tystngh kay liye mzaak ki khdmt kesay bnatay hayn؟

Answer: testbed.configuretestingmodule () ka tarykha kwnyy kay tystngh anfrastrkchr ka ayk aham hasaha haay۔as ka astamal ayk tystngh madaywl tshkyl denay aur bnanay kay liye kya jata hay jo ywnt ki janch kwnyy ajzaaa ، hadayat ، khdmat aur aap ki drkhwast kay dyghr akaiywn kay liye mahawl ko mrtb krta haay۔yha tarykha aap ko aap kay tyst kay l required anhasaar ، fraham knndghan aur aalamyha ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ yahan tyst byda kay mksad aur faalyt ka ayk jaizaha haay۔as tsawr ki nkaly krta haay۔testbed.configuretestingmodule () ka tarykha tystngh madaywl bnanay kay liye zamha dar hay jahan aap apnay ywnt tyst kay liye zurwry trtybat tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔as main fraham knndghan ، draamdat ، aalamyha ، aur aap kay tyst kay liye drkar dyghr madaywlza ki wzuahat shaml haay۔ anhasaar anjykshn syt ap: kwnyy anhasaar anjykshn (DI) par bohat zayada anhasaar krta hay

Question: kwnyy main Iterabledfers klas ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main ، Iterabledfers klas tbdyly ka ptha lghanay kay tarykha kar ka ayk hasaha hay aur is ka astamal kabl (jma karnay ki tarha) ashyaa main hony wali tbdylywn ko tryk karnay kay liye kya tbdylywn ka mwsar andaza main ptha lghaya jaiay۔ tkrar shuda affr klas aam tawr par kwnyy kay zaryaha andrwny tawr par astamal hawta hay aur un kay ayply kyshn kwda main dawylprza kay zaryaha braha rast astamal nahin hawta haay۔taham ، yeh kwnyy kay tbdyly ka ptha lghanay kay nzaam main ayk aham krdar ada krta haay۔ yahan Iterabledfers klas kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: yeh kwnyy kay tbdyly ka ptha lghanay kay nzaam ka ayk hasaha hay ، jo jzaw kay aadad wa shmar main hony wali tbdylywn ki bnyad par nzaryha ko mwsar andaza main ptha lghanay aur ap dayt karnay ka zamha dar haay۔.yha Iterabledfers klas mkhtlf aksam kay kabl ashyaa ، jesay sray ، syt ، aur kstm Iterables main tbdylywn ka sragh lghanay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda hakmt amlywn ka ayk mjmwaha mhaya krta haay۔ Iterabledifers main ayk hakmt amly Iterablediffer antrfys ka atalak krty hay ، jo ayt aybl aabjykt main tbdylywn ko tryk karnay aur un ka ptha lghanay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat krty haay۔.anghwlr ki tbdyly ka ptha lghanay ka tarykha kar Iterabledifers rjstry sy mnasb hakmt amly ka astamal kya jata hay js ki bnyad par Iterablefers rjstry ka mshahadha kya jarhaa haay۔kwnyy main klas kabl tklyd ashyaa main tbdylywn ko tryk karnay kay liye hakmt amly fraham karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔yha kwnyy kay tbdyly ka ptha lghanay kay nzaam ka ayk klydy jzaw hay aur mjmwawn main tbdylywn ki bnyad par nzaryha ko mwsar andaza main ptha lghanay aur ap dayt karnay main ayk aham krdar ada krta haay۔

ayn jy-kntynr hadayt kwnyy main ayk sakhty hadayt hay jo dawm main kesi bhi ansar ko nahin dyty haay۔yha aam tawr par ghrwp main plys hawldar kay tawr par astamal hawta hay aur kesi bhi azuafy HTML mark ap ko shaml kyay baghair mshrwta tawr par mwad pysh krta haay۔jb *ngtemplateOutlet hadayt kay sath mil kar ، yeh mthark tawr par tymplyts ko pysh karnay ka ayk taaktwr tarykha fraham krta haay۔yhaan *ngtemplateOutlet kay sath NG-container astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: ansar kay andr apnay tymplyt ki wzuahat kryn: htmlcopy kwda
{{pygham}}
NG-Container hadayt namha kay sath sath *ngtemplateOutlet hadayt kay sath tymplyt ko mthark tawr par pysh karnay kay liay: htmlcopy kwda
